data.Name: Beach House
data.Bio: Beach House is a dream pop group that formed in 2004 in Baltimore, Maryland, United States. The group consists of Victoria Legrand (vocals, organ) and Alex Scally (guitar, keyboards). Legrand is the niece of French composer Michel Legrand. The group has released seven albums: Beach House (2006), Devotion (2008), Teen Dream (2010), Bloom (2012), Depression Cherry (2015), Thank Your Lucky Stars (2015) and 7 (2018). They've announced their 8th studio album "Once Twice Melody" which will be gradually released from November 10 Read more on Last.fm
